## Service Description
The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal for the Repair and Overhaul (R&O) of Light Support Vehicle Wheeled (LSVW) Transmission with Torque Converter. The scope of the work includes disassembly, cleaning, inspection, repair, overhaul, reassembly, painting, calibration, testing, and packaging/preservation of the transmission and torque converter components.

## Technical Requirements
The following items will be subject to service:

* Transmission with Torque Converter LSVW (40 units)
* Transmission with Torque Converter LSVW BER NSN 2520-21-910-8777 (4 units)

## Procurement Method
This requirement uses a competitive open-bidding process. Electronic submission of bids is required.
